settings.title: What are Pili and Elemi oils?
settings.text: Pili Ani is the first and only company in the world that offers beauty and wellness products using the Pili Tree, which is indigenous to the Philippines. Pili Oil, extracted from the pulp of the fruit, is laden with antioxidants and has intense moisturizing properties. Elemi Oil, on the other hand, is tapped from the bark of the Pili Tree and naturally contains antibacterial and firming properties. In fact, a well-known French luxury label, which has a history that dates over a hundred years, has been utilizing this precious ingredient in their Ultra Correction Lift cream.

settings.title: What is SLS? Do Pili Ani products contain SLS?
